history.incident: Beginning of Muslim rule in Bengal by Bakhtiyar Khilji
Shamsuddin Ilyas Shah established the independent Sultanate of Bengal
Bengal becomes part of the Mughal Empire after the Battle of Rajmahal
Battle of Plassey: British East India Company defeats Nawab Siraj-ud-Daulah, marking the beginning of British rule in Bengal
Indian Rebellion of 1857 (Sepoy Mutiny) spreads in Bengal
Partition of Bengal by the British (later annulled in 1911)
Partition of British India: Bengal is divided into West Bengal (India) and East Bengal (Pakistan)
Language Movement: Bengali people protest against the imposition of Urdu as the official language of Pakistan
Bangladesh Liberation War: Bangladesh declares independence from Pakistan
Bangladesh achieves official recognition and independence
Assassination of Sheikh Mujibur Rahman, the founding father of Bangladesh
Restoration of parliamentary democracy in Bangladesh
Shahbagh Movement: A major protest demanding capital punishment for war criminals of 1971
